metadata.title: CVE-2018-13098 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in fs/f2fs/inode.c in the Linux kernel through4.17.3. A denial of service (slab out-of-bounds read and BUG) can occur fora modified f2fs filesystem image in which FI_EXTRA_ATTR is set in an inode.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-13098` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-58-generic - 4.15.0-58.64
linux-image-4.15.0-58-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-58.64
linux-image-4.15.0-58-lowlatency - 4.15.0-58.64
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-58-generic - 4.15.0-58.64
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-58-lowlatency - 4.15.0-58.64
No subscription required

No subscription required
